Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT M.RAMO, I.CODCAU, DESCAUGRUPO_CAUSAS
FROM seguros.v0mestsini
 
WHERE M.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO   =  :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND M.RAMO                =  :RAMO
  AND I.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO   =  M.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND S.RAMO                =  M.RAMO
  AND S.CODCAU              =  I.CODCAU
  AND S.SITUACAO           <>  '2'
  AND S.GRUPO_CAUSAS        =  'PT'
/
 END SQL
